[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@native-html/table-plugin](./table-plugin.md) &gt; [TableConfig](./table-plugin.tableconfig.md) &gt; [useLayoutAnimations](./table-plugin.tableconfig.uselayoutanimations.md)

## TableConfig.useLayoutAnimations property

Use native `LayoutAnimation` instead of `Animated` module with `autoheight`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useLayoutAnimations?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

This should be preferred performance-wise, but you need to setup `UIManager` on android. See official guide: https://facebook.github.io/react-native/docs/layoutanimation
